Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the impact it could have on your operations, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a high-quality solution at a discounted rate compared to the standard market price of $12,000. I am confident this investment will pay off in numerous ways, enhancing efficiency and profitability. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you're ready to proceed with this exclusive offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
